author: CTPPS
body:
This PR provides several fixes and improvements for CTPPS alignments. The definitive target is to have the alignments in DB, but we are too late for the deadline of 5 March. We plan to have it done for the re-reco of 2018 data.

This PR is built on top of #22264 and thus has the same dependencies, e.g. #22290. Consequently, some tests will necessarily fail before the latter is merged.
title: CTPPS: alignment update
